entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023
